medical_history.chief_complaint: A 12-year-old girl referred for investigation of elevated resting creatine kinase levels and rapid exhaustion after intensive exercise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began with elevated creatine kinase levels (700 U/l) and rapid exhaustion after intensive exercise. The MH disposition was confirmed by the in vitro halothane/caffeine muscle test, and the maternal diagnosis of MH susceptibility was made 2 months later.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The mother of the patient was diagnosed as MH-susceptible 2 months later. No other relevant medical history was mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother is MH-susceptible, and both grandparents were found to be MH-negative.
